name: Snake Project
description:
A simple game, kept simple but with thrills. The idea is based on the old classic "Snake".

The game has three levels to choose from, per level the difficulty will increase due to the level environment. The player controls a snake that grows bigger and bigger by eating randomly appearing fruits. Depending on what the snake eats, different things happen (buffs and debuffs).

I created the game for my studies in Game Development.

The focus here is on the programming aspect and the graphics were neglected.

This is the first game I created and finished on my own. 

Enjoy the game, 

greetings Feabs
